net.proteusframework.users.model

Class CredentialPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.users.model.CredentialPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Entity<Long>

    @Entity
public class CredentialPolicy
extends Object
implements Entity<Long>
    Models policies for a credential.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPasswordPreviousCount

        public int getPasswordPreviousCount()
        Get the number of previous passwords to store. New passwords may not match any previous passwords.
        Returns:
        int.

      • getPasswordRules

public LocalizedObjectKey getPasswordRules()

        Returns:
        LocalizedObjectKey.

      • isPasswordCrackCheck

        public boolean isPasswordCrackCheck()
        Get if a password should be checked by a password cracker.
        Returns:
        true to check the password using a cracker.
